data.title: Awful
data.text: Not a very nice welcome when I arrived the other morning. I ALWAYS go here when I am working in town (only every other year) but I avoid the namebrand coffee places and go to this local shop. I ordered a nonfat mocha and it was made in front of me but the lady was not friendly at all. A barista should be a morning person (although it was 7:30 a.m., so not that early) She didn't say Thank You, which I think is standard for every shopkeep, big or small. I took my drink and sipped it a few blocks away as I was walking to the Capitol. It was horrid! It tasted like chicken noodle soup. I guess the milk was sour; I am not sure. But I dumped it out and walked into IkeBox and received a much warmer reception and much much better espresso. Will never go back Crema (not that they would care or notice)

data.title: Good coffee, good price
data.text: Central location in strip next to Equitable Center. near Nordstrom and Macy's, with pleasant inside and sidewalk seating. Self-service.  I've never tried anything but coffee here.

data.title: BEST COFFEE AND BUBBLE TEA IN TOWN!
data.text: I love everything about this quaint little shop! It's tucked away in a beautiful little courtyard across from the Salem Center Mall between Bank Of America and Love Love Teriyaki. The coffee and bubble tea are amazing! Their baked goods are all baked fresh in house. They have a huge selection of grab & go lunch items as well as daily drink & lunch specials! The atmosphere is friendly and inviting and the staff is always welcoming! They were super easy to talk to and seemed happy to help or answer any questions I had. I didn't know much about bubble tea when I first found Crema, but the staff were very helpful and informative when it came to deciding what to try from their vast selection. You can tell they really enjoy what they're doing. I really love that they believe in using high quality ingredients and make it a point to support local businesses whenever possible! If you haven't tried Crema yet, I highly recommend you do! YOU WONT BE DISAPPOINTED! 😋

data.title: Oh soo good...
data.text: White chocolate mocha is so good!  The family love their bubble teas.  Haven't tried the food yet.  Staff are nice and friendly.

data.title: Great Coffee and Food
data.text: This place has everything you want in a Coffee shop! Located near the Salem Center it has a wonderful outdoor seating area as well as really amazing coffee. My husband and I were hungry for breakfast and decided to try one of their croissant breakfast sandwiches which turned out to be amazing. The girls at the counter were  friendly and very easy going. Amazing coffee, great customer service, wonderful food and perfect outdoor seating! If you are looking for the perfect place to relax and have a cup of amazing coffee while eating a delicious breakfast than please stop at Crema Coffee Brewtique.

data.title: Best Coffee in Town.
data.text:
I ran across Crema because of walking around in downtown Salem at the Center Mall. Not a block away from the mall, the place has a welcoming environment, a great staff and amazing coffee. When I arrived, they had just started doing food and I had a wonderful, WONDERFUL plate of Nachos. Yes Nachos at a coffee shop. Their house made salsa made me drool as I munched away on the olives, tomatoes, (amazing) black beans, cheese and lettuce that was on the chips. Oh I'm drooling as I write this review. If you want amazing coffee and great food, I highly recommend this place.

Oh and bubble tea. YES bubble tea. Those little round black chewy goodness at the bottom of smoothies!! The mixtures this place uses is wonderful and it's flavorful, fruity (or Matcha-y if you choose the Matcha flavor like I have a few times) and delicious. There is no question that I will be back countless more times.
